'''2.0.387-stage''' ([[wikipedia:Microsoft Windows|Windows]]), or '''2.1.388-stage''' ([[wikipedia:macOS|macOS]]) is a version of the [[Minecraft launcher|launcher]].

== Additions ==
* The language of the launcher can now be changed.</onlyinclude>
